Subject: Arrival Of K-9

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::K-9::

A one bot, personal, transport ship, comes through the transwarp portal.
This ship was differant, it was armed. There were plasma cannons,
lazers, and even a limited missile complimate. The ship came through the
atmosphere, and passed the terminator, into day time. K-9, the bot
piloting the ship, scanned the area. He found a battle raging, but
decided to ignore it. He located the Ark, and started heading for it.
Not long after he picked up the Cybertronian Fire. He altered course,
and headed for it. He opened a commlink, to them, on a coded Maximal
channel. He didn't want Predicons knowing a new Maximal had arrived.
"Maximal ship, this is the transport ship, Nova. I'm heading your way,
and will land out front. Over." He said, to the comm.
